name: Something Is Killing the Children
summary: The story follows a boy that lives in a town marked by a recent string of child deaths. A mysterious girl called Erica Slaughter seems to know how to stop the killings. What’s causing the killings is a more terrifying matter altogether. Tynion and Dell’Edera pull the curtains back on a lethal environment where the subject of mortality becomes a serious consideration at too young an age. Death surrounds the town and its future generation, and safety is but a word quickly losing its purchase on reality.
